newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.022pts to 99.826.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.022pts to 99.826.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds rose 0.022 points on Wednesday to 99.826, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio fell by 0.002 points to 2.494 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, rose 0.004 points to 96.142 points, the bank said, while the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.430 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 fell 1.696 points to 1,194.375.
